title: Strategy and discovery
description: Getting to know your team, your business and your users. I will ask a lot of questions and help you answer them to thoroughly define the scope of your project.

title: Design systems
description: Design systems are one of the best tools I know to document design patterns and principles in order to bridge the gap between design and development.

title: Front-end code
description: HTML, CSS and JavaScript are my bread and butter. I like to move to code as soon as possible to materialise responsive layouts, typography and interactivity.

title: UX and design
description: I design websites and interfaces that are consistent, maintainable, accessible and take performance into account, while also delivering a great user experience on all platforms.

title: Content management
description: Even complex websites can be maintained & updated easily when a CMS like Craft or static site generators like Hugo, Eleventy or Jekyll are on the menu.

title: Workshops
description: I teach web development and design to students at school. Trust me, they are quite a demanding lot. If you or your company need a workshop, just ask.
